title: Sippin' Yak
lyrics:
We like hustlers, ballers, all up in the house
At the bar, poppin', workin' it out
We like strictly pissy chicks sippin' the yak
In the club, actin', throwin' it back
We need riders, thugs to scheme up in the cut
Gangsters on the floor, throw it up
We be ghetto celebrities in the V.I.P
Blowin' bags of the green, that's how we do it
